name: Midnight Man
summary:
This game is based on a real ritual to summon the spirit named 'The Midnight Man' to punish rule breakers in Pagan religions long ago. This ritual is still practiced today.

Game Rules:

Your goal is to avoid the midnight man at all costs until 3:33AM. You may move through the house to avoid him. If he is near; your candle will go out. You cannot re-light you're candle if you are near the midnight man The midnight man has the abilities to move objects, open doors .etc, so watch out for this happening as it will indicate that he is near. If you are still alive at 3:33am, you’ve won..
